items.title: Dindigul Chicken Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains:Seeraga Samba Rice 275 g + Chicken Biryani Cut 300 g Dindigul Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: Do you remember the last time you prepared biryani and how long it took you to do it? It must have taken you somewhere around 2-3 hours, right? Dindigul chicken biryani kit can cut that time in more than half. The chicken pieces are there, the rice is part of the kit and the biryani paste too. It cooks in no time.

items.title: Ambur Chicken Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains: Seeraga Samba Rice 275 g + Chicken Biryani Cut 300 g + Ambur Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: Cooking delicious biryani in all its flavours is now easier than you think. Don’t believe us? Try the Ambur chicken biryani kit to know what we are talking about. This kit has everything you need to cook a mouth-watering portion of biryani and serve – the rice, the best pieces of chicken and the biryani paste.

items.title: Dindigul Mutton Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains: Seeraga Samba Rice 275 g + Mutton Biryani Cut 300 g + Dindigul Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: Many people complain about how long it takes to prepare even a single portion of biryani. You don’t have to be one of them. Just place an order for Dindigul mutton biryani kit and find all the ingredients necessary for cooking aromatic biryani for your loved ones. It has all of the flavours and none of the hassles.

items.title: Bhai Chicken Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains: Basmati Rice 275 g + Chicken Biryani Cut 300 g + Bhai Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: With the best quality of rice, the choicest pieces of chicken and ready biryani paste, you can prepare tasty biryani at home easily. Bhai chicken biryani kit has all the required ingredients, the flavours and none of the long-winding steps. Next time your family or kids ask you to prepare something delicious, you know what to do.

items.title: Ambur Mutton Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains: Seeraga Samba Rice 275 g + Mutton Biryani Cut 300 g + Ambur Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: You don't have to do through the entire process preparing biryani anymore. The next time you are craving for some mutton biryani, buy the Ambur mutton biryani kit and enjoy a hearty meal. The kit has everything you need to prepare biryani – chunky mutton curry cuts, rice and the biryani paste. Add this item to your cart right away.

items.title: Bhai Mutton Biryani Kit
items.details: Serves: 2-3 | (Kit Contains: Basmati Rice 275 g + Mutton Biryani Cut 300 g + Bhai Biryani Paste 200 g)
items.dis: The aroma of mutton biryani is something that can put many food lovers in a trance. At least for a few seconds! You can have these aromas coming out of your kitchen with this Bhai mutton biryani kit. It has the rice, the fresh mutton pieces and the biryani paste. Just put them all together and cook it in no time.

items.title: Chicken Breast Boneless
items.dis: One of the most popular and versatile parts, our chicken breast is carefully trimmed up with no bone or skin. Delicious pink meat with very little fat and an excellent source of lean protein is a pretty neat deal.Ideal for:Malai kebabs, soups, sandwiches, salads and skewers.Slice up for stir-fries, marinate, grill, pan-fry or oven roast it, filled with your favorite filling.Freshness Indicator: The chicken should be pink in color and cold to touch..
items.tip: Tip:When pan-frying, ensure your chicken cooks evenly and stays juicy by pounding the breast out with a rolling pin until it’s slightly flattened.
